title: Hans Urs von Balthasar - theologian (51 books)(epub, mobi)
description:
51 books by Hans Urs von Balthasar (epub and mobi), and 6 books about him (pdf)

Balthasar (1905-1988), a Swiss theologian and a Catholic priest, is generally regarded as one of the most important theologians of the 20th century.

Includes the following works by Balthasar:

Explorations in Theology I-IV
Glory of the Lord: A Theological Aesthetics, I-VII
Theo-Drama: Theological Dramatic Theory, I-V
Theo-Logic, I-III


Christian and Anxiety, The
Christian Meditation
Christian State of Life, The
Cosmic Liturgy: The Universe According to Maximus the Confessor
Credo
Dare We Hope "That All Men Be Saved"?
Does Jesus Know Us -- Do We Know Him?
Elucidations
Epilogue
Grain of Wheat, The
In The Fullness of Faith
Laity and The Life of The Counsels, The
Life Out of Death
Light of The Word
Love Alone is Credible
Moment of Christian Witness, The
Mysterium Paschale
New Elucidations
Office of Peter and the Structure of the Church, The
Prayer
Presence and Thought: An Essay on the Religious Philosophy of Gregory of Nyssa
Priestly Spirituality
Principles of Christian Morality (with Ratzinger and Schurmann)
Romano Guardini: Reform From The Source
Scandal of The Incarnation, The
Short Primer for Unsettled Laymen, A
Test Everything, Hold Fast to What Is Good
Theology of Karl Barth, The
Threefold Garland, The
Tragedy Under Grace
You Crown the Year with Your Goodness
You Have Words of Eternal Life

Since there are so many files, I've zipped them up for the sake of simplicity. After unzipping, they will import into calibre easily with covers and metadata.

Many thanks to the original uploaders.
